title: Mystery Chest?
body:
Where can we buy the Mystery Chest for ourselves?

I saw it briefly while the store was being updated but could not purchase it at the time due to a message about the price having been changed recently - where did it go?

replies.body: The mystery chest is for gifting friends. It showed in the store while an update was being applied to it.
yea i saw it aswell it was 750 rp tho
It ended about a week ago (that's right; I said it).
